name: The Puka Top in Large
description:
DESCRIPTION: The Puka Top features a gently scooped neckline in front, dolman short sleeves, and a dramatic open back that is gathered at the top. This is a gorgeous top and works equally well for a night out on the town or as a beach cover up. It could be worn over a bikini or a cami if you prefer more coverage of your back, but it is absolutely stunning when worn without a bra. Professionally finished, serged seams. 

The fabrics that I use are sustainable, eco-friendly knit jerseys that have an incredible drape and softness. They are also very stretchy and will accommodate a range of sizes. The bamboo jersey is slightly lighter-weight, and the soy jersey is a bit more soft and stretchy. Both are absolutely heavenly! You will want to live in these clothes all the time!

AVAILABLE IN YOUR CHOICE OF: 
FABRICS: soy & organic cotton stretch jersey or bamboo & organic cotton stretch jersey.
COLORS: SOY: coconut, pistachio, coffee bean, plum, ruby, pebble, storm, pacific, moss, ocean, or lava rock. BAMBOO: lava rock, black/grey stripe, mist, mocha, bamboo, fern, forest, coconut, shell, coral, lychee, orchid, marine, or sky.  See bottom photo for color chart.

IMPORTANT: See Size Chart Page to determine your perfect fit.

SHIPPING: US and international shipping are via Priority Mail.

name: The Noelani Halter Dress in Large
description:
DESCRIPTION: The Noelani is a halter dress featuring a draping neckline and a fitted silhouette through the hip. This dress is super hot! It can also be worn as a one-shoulder dress by turning it to the side. Professionally finished, serged seams. 

The fabrics that I use are sustainable, eco-friendly knit jerseys that have an incredible drape and softness. They are also very stretchy and will accommodate a range of sizes. The bamboo jersey is slightly lighter-weight, and the soy jersey is a bit more soft and stretchy. Both are absolutely heavenly! You will want to live in these clothes all the time!

AVAILABLE IN YOUR CHOICE OF: 
FABRICS: soy & organic cotton stretch jersey or bamboo & organic cotton stretch jersey.
COLORS: SOY: coconut, pistachio, coffee bean, plum, ruby, pebble, storm, pacific, moss, ocean, or lava rock. BAMBOO: lava rock, black/grey stripe, mist, mocha, bamboo, fern, forest, coconut, shell, coral, lychee, orchid, marine, or sky.

IMPORTANT: See Size Chart Page to determine the best fit.

SHIPPING: US and international shipping are via Priority Mail.
